content.raw: The sensor\_config.yaml is failing the compliance check because it includes the wamv\_p3d sensor. We’re asking teams not to include this “sensor” \(see [the note here ](#!/osrf/vrx/wiki/events/19/phase2_retrospective)under P3D sensor\). Could you edit your sensor\_config.yaml to remove it, then commit and push again to update your pull request?
content.html: The sensor_config.yaml is failing the compliance check because it includes the wamv_p3d sensor. We’re asking teams not to include this “sensor” (see the note here under P3D sensor). Could you edit your sensor_config.yaml to remove it, then commit and push again to update your pull request?
